>
[Crafter's Appraisal](/Feats.aspx?ID=6470) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="General" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=615" />
<trait label="Skill" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=695" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 229 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Prerequisites**
Trained in [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=37)

</column>

---

Your knowledge of items' construction allows you to discern their magical effects as well. You can use Crafting instead of a skill associated with a magic tradition to [Identify Magic](/Actions.aspx?ID=2365) on magic items, though not on any other sorts of magic.
